author: Special Correspondent
text:
The body of fisherman Nelson (30) belonging to Tsunami Nagar, Pazhayaru, was found ashore off the Kottaimedu region near Pazhayaru on Sunday. Nelson, along with his friend Kalaimani (45) had ventured into the sea for fishing on January 1 in a fibre boat but their boat capsized in mid sea. While fishermen nearby could save Kalaimani, a search was mounted for Nelson.

On Sunday, only his body could be recovered. Pudupattinam police have registered a case and are investigating.
title: Body of fisherman recovered
